flounder.fbos

Class FBO

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.fbos.FBO

  • public class FBO
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents a OpenGL Frame Buffer object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected FBO(int width, int height, int attachments, boolean fitToScreen, float sizeScalar, DepthBufferType depthBufferType, boolean useColourBuffer, boolean linearFiltering, boolean clampEdge, boolean alphaChannel, boolean antialiased, int samples)
      A new OpenGL FBO object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FBO

        protected FBO(int width,
              int height,
              int attachments,
              boolean fitToScreen,
              float sizeScalar,
              DepthBufferType depthBufferType,
              boolean useColourBuffer,
              boolean linearFiltering,
              boolean clampEdge,
              boolean alphaChannel,
              boolean antialiased,
              int samples)
        A new OpenGL FBO object.
        Parameters:
        width - The FBO's width.
        height - The FBO's height.
        attachments - The amount of attachments to create.
        fitToScreen - If the width and height values should match the screen.
        sizeScalar - A scalar factor between the FBO and the screen, enabled when fitToScreen is enabled. (1.0f disables scalar).
        depthBufferType - The type of depth buffer to use in the FBO.
        useColourBuffer - If a colour buffer should be created.
        linearFiltering - If linear filtering should be used.
        clampEdge - If the image should be clamped to the edges.
        alphaChannel - If alpha should be supported.
        antialiased - If the image will be antialiased.
        samples - How many MFAA samples should be used on the FBO. Zero disables multisampling.

    • Method Detail

      • newFBO

        public static FBOBuilder newFBO(int width,
                                int height)
        Creates a new FBO Builder.
        Parameters:
        width - The initial width for the new FBO.
        height - The initial height for the new FBO.
        Returns:
        A new FBO Builder.

      • newFBO

        public static FBOBuilder newFBO(float sizeScalar)
        Creates a new FBO Builder, fit to the screen.
        Parameters:
        sizeScalar - A scalar factor between the FBO and the screen, enabled when fitToScreen is enabled. (1.0f disables scalar).
        Returns:
        A new FBO Builder.

        public void resolveFBO(FBO outputFBO)
        Blits this FBO and all attachments to another FBO.
        Parameters:
        outputFBO - The other FBO to blit to.

      • resolveFBO

        public void resolveFBO(int readBuffer,
                       int drawBuffer,
                       FBO outputFBO)
        Blits this FBO attachment to another FBO attachment.
        Parameters:
        readBuffer - The colour attachment to be read from.
        drawBuffer - The colour draw buffer to be written to.
        outputFBO - The other FBO to blit to.

      • getAttachments

        public int getAttachments()
        Gets the number of attachments in this FBO.
        Returns:
        The number of attachments in this FBO.

      • getColourTexture

        public int getColourTexture(int readBuffer)
        Gets a colour buffer.
        Parameters:
        readBuffer - The colour attachment to be read from.
        Returns:
        The OpenGL colour texture id.

      • getDepthTexture

        public int getDepthTexture()
        Gets the depth texture.
